features.name: Workspaces
features.explanation: Connected workspaces let you separate company and personal work. Each workspace can have its own containers, projects, and team members.

features.name: Containers
features.explanation: Organize projects by area—e.g. Work, Studio, Home. Filter and scope your calendar, kanban, and inbox by container.

features.name: Projects
features.explanation: Ongoing efforts with an outcome. Group tasks by project, link projects to routine blocks, and scope your planning to what matters.

features.name: Tasks
features.explanation: Individual work items with status, priority, and dates. Drag tasks into routine blocks to schedule your week.

features.name: Routine blocks
features.explanation: Reusable time slots (e.g. Deep work, Meetings) that define your week. Tasks from allowed projects appear when you schedule.

features.name: Daily schedule blocks
features.explanation: Fixed slots (meals, buffer, sleep) that show when you're available. Tasks cannot be scheduled here—only into routine blocks.

features.name: Daily reviews
features.explanation: Quick end-of-day reflection. Capture what happened and how you felt.

features.name: Weekly reviews
features.explanation: Weekly reflection on accomplishments, disappointments, and priorities for the week ahead.

features.name: Monthly reviews
features.explanation: Monthly reflection and planning. Track progress, adjust priorities, and set intentions.

features.name: Quarterly reviews
features.explanation: Quarterly check-ins. Align on goals, review progress, and plan the next quarter.

features.name: Annual reviews
features.explanation: Year-in-review. Reflect on the full year, track goals, and set direction for the next.

features.name: Personal review templates
features.explanation: Create and edit your own review templates. Define steps, prompts, and structure for your reflections.

features.name: Organisation review templates
features.explanation: Org-wide and container-level templates. Share review structures across your team or workspace.

features.name: Calendar sync
features.explanation: Sync with Google Calendar or other providers. See availability, schedule around events, and keep your week in sync.

features.name: API access
features.explanation: Access your data via the MONOid API. Build dashboards, automations, and agents. Export to CSV or your tools.

features.name: Linear
features.explanation: Sync issues and projects from Linear. New issues create tasks in MONOid; status changes sync back.

features.name: Notion
features.explanation: Connect Notion databases. New pages create containers, projects, or tasks in MONOid with links back to the source.
